page.title: 11Moorhouse Moor,Allerton
page.content: {Primary Land Cover: Farmland-Intensively managed grassland used for pasture or for cutting as grass,silage or hay. {Secondary Land Cover: Residential-Houses and flats{ {Amenities:} The amenities in this area are an off licence,private shop selling plants and eggs, and a bus service. {Family Life: In this square a resident told us that it was quarter of an hour to the nearest shop and five minutes to the bus stop. {Employment:} Most of the people in this square must travel out of the area for work or create their own private business e.g Farms.
